Title: Ashes to Ashes
Writer: Craig Johnson (book), Hunt Baldwin (developer), John Coveny (developer), Hunt Baldwin, John Coveny
Actors: Robert Taylor, Katee Sackhoff, Lou Diamond Phillips, Bailey Chase
Plot: After killing David Ridges, sheriff Longmire uncovers a clue that could prove that Ridges killed Miller Beck. Meanwhile, Branch is curious about a possible relationship between his father and Jacob Nighthorse.
